posts.post_content:
Graded or ungraded in any decent condition.
PM me if you have one for sale.
Thanks.
Bob

Hi Bob - I have an extra Nagle but calling it "decent" would be a bit generous. Decent centering anyway. Yours for free if you like.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/miscellany2/large/Blank%202.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks David, I appreciate it. I thought I had completed the set 15 years ago but the other day I noticed I couldn’t find the Nagle, so I’ll take it. 
Bob
Hey Bob. Did you ever complete the 1910 150 series set?

[quote name="dk1216" post=2448974]Hey Bob. Did you ever complete the 1910 150 series set?[/QUOTE]

Yes I did, several years ago. I’m glad I went after it when I did because they appear to be as scarce as hen’s teeth.

[quote name="Lunker21" post=2449103]That was very cool, David.[/QUOTE]

David is one of the most generous people I’ve ever met. It’s good to know there are so many great people who I have met in this hobby over the years.
